Build 43143
1. Goto issue list, select issue and click create issue relates to
2. Click on "+" for link issue
AR: Popup with linked issue contains already linked issue

1. new control uses by hub vs old YT control
hub uses toggle control vs checkbox on YT (guess we need uniform it)

2. Background for YT admin page vs hub (white vs gray)
I guess we should have same background for all admin pages

3. interligne for query arrist. I guess we need reduce it
compare old with new:

4. Font size becomes less for some text and links (12px vs 13px)

5. Strange color #FF008C for the star (and for link to issue, after clone)

7. interligne for some hub-admin pages was reduced (the readability become worse)
Compare old users vs new

8. Outline for tabs
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1530622371314"},{"name":"updated","value":"1530712124003"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim {"id":"JT-47872","entityId":"25-2030367","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47872"},{"name":"summary","value":"Project logo is not updated on the overview and in projects list"},{"name":"description","value":"

build 42711

STR:

  1. Update project logo
  2. In the same tab go to overview of this project
  3. Then go to the projects list

AR:
On both pages there's old logo instead of new

After page refresh actual logo is shown
